Control Name: Communicates Unauthorized Use and Disclosure—Events that resulted in unauthorized use or disclosure of personal information are communicated to the data subjects, legal and regulatory authorities, and others as required.

control_attributes.Control: Communicates Unauthorized Use and Disclosure—Events that resulted in unauthorized use or disclosure of personal information are communicated to the data subjects, legal and regulatory authorities, and others as required.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC7.4 The entity responds to identified security incidents by executing a defined incident response program to understand, contain, remediate, and communicate security incidents, as appropriate.
